entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lloydminster
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:45 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -26.8°C

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
